CloudServer Brings Us 2GBLinux KVMs for Only $1.99/Month (on Annual) or Windows KVMs for $3/Month!

buffalo, cheap vps, chicago, cloudserver, kvm, linux, los angeles, windows September 9, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

We last saw CloudServer back on July 4, 2021.  Now they’re back with some more very cool offers for cheap VPS systems – either Linux or Windows:

  • Get a 2GB Linux KVM for only $4/mo (or $1.99/mo on an annual contract!)
  • Or a 2GB Windows KVM which (with account credit) comes out to only $3/mo!

That’s awesome pricing.  Note that the Linux system is available in New York only, while their other deals are available in LA or Chicago as well.

Their WHOIS is public. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept PayPal and credit cards.

Here’s a little about CloudServer in their own words:

“Hi Brandon back again, and I am happy to present our summer sale! CloudServer continues to offer low cost high-performance Windows and KVM VPS services. Cloudserver’s growth has been consistent, and we have been in business for roughly 9 months now. We really value the community, and we are all about taking care of the customers! This is a LowEndBox exclusive and we have brought back the July 4th Windows VPS offer!”

If you decide to give CloudServer a try, please tell others how it goes in the comments below.
